mapper.select: SELECT c.clients_id, c.clients_name, c.clients_zipcode, c.clients_address, c.clients_building, c.clients_telephone, c.clients_credit_limit, c.clients_remarks, c.clients_owner_id AS user_id, u.name AS user_name FROM clients AS c LEFT JOIN users AS u ON c.clients_owner_id = u.id LEFT JOIN user_departments AS ud ON u.user_department_id = ud.user_departments_id LEFT JOIN user_companies AS uc ON ud.user_company_id = uc.user_companies_id WHERE c.clients_id= #{id} AND uc.user_companies_id = #{companyId} AND c.clients_deleted = false

SELECT c.clients_id, c.clients_name, c.clients_zipcode, c.clients_address, c.clients_building, c.clients_telephone, c.clients_credit_limit, c.clients_remarks, c.clients_owner_id AS user_id, u.name AS user_name FROM clients AS c LEFT JOIN users AS u ON c.clients_owner_id = u.id LEFT JOIN user_departments AS ud ON u.user_department_id = ud.user_departments_id LEFT JOIN user_companies AS uc ON ud.user_company_id = uc.user_companies_id WHERE uc.user_companies_id = #{companyId} and c.clients_deleted = false
mapper.update: UPDATE clients SET clients_name = #{name}, clients_zipcode = #{zipcode}, clients_address = #{address}, clients_building = #{building}, clients_telephone = #{telephone}, clients_credit_limit = #{creditLimit}, clients_owner_id = #{ownerId}, clients_remarks = #{remarks}, clients_deleted = #{deleted} WHERE clients_id = #{id}
